title: String Trimming Function
description: This function, TRIM, is designed to remove leading spaces from a given string input. It takes in a string of maximum length defined by STRING_LENGTH and returns the trimmed version of that string, ensuring that all leading spaces are removed.
name: TRIM

input.name: str
input.description: The input string from which leading spaces need to be removed.

output.name: TRIM
output.description: The output string after leading spaces have been stripped away.

return_value.description: The trimmed string that results from the removal of leading spaces.
